title: Add Course
nameHelperText: The name of the course. Do not include the course code in this field.
codeHelperText: The course code. Other users can use this code to find your course.
schoolHelperText: The school to which this course belongs.
subjectsHelperText: The subjects to which this course belong. You can choose multiple options.
